name: Flu Survival
description:
Being a flu virus isn't easy! You've had a warm and comfortable life inside your human host and that's about to come to an end.

All of a sudden, you find yourself sneezed out and launched into a hostile world that wants to eradicate you!

Help Viry survive in this hostile environment until it finds a new host in this fast-paced "viral" runner game!

If you like it, you can play the full version, with leaderboards and achievement support, and extra locations to unlock. Download it in the Google Play Store:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tg.fluSurvival
